library.title: ExpiLibrary
library.description: A modern, open-source digital library management system designed to streamline the organization, cataloging, and accessibility of books and resources for libraries of all sizes.

miyuki.title: Miyuki
miyuki.description: Miyuki is an all-in-one Discord bot built for smarter, smoother, and more engaging servers. It combines moderation, automation, music, utilities, and entertainment in one sleek, customizable package â€” adapting effortlessly to any community size or style.
